title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
fullTitle: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes (TV Series 1984â€“1985)

episodes.title: A Scandal in Bohemia
episodes.plot: Sherlock Holmes finds himself evenly matched when he is employed by the King of Bohemia to retrieve an indiscreet photograph from the American actress and singer, Irene Adler.

episodes.title: The Dancing Men
episodes.plot: A gentleman is baffled when the childish drawings of little dancing men terrify his American wife. Sherlock Holmes soon discovers why.

episodes.title: The Naval Treaty
episodes.plot: An unknown thief steals an important naval treaty from a Foreign Office clerk; Sherlock Holmes sets out to find it.

episodes.title: The Solitary Cyclist
episodes.plot: A strange man on a bicycle follows a young music teacher as she bicycles on a lonely road to and from the city.

episodes.title: The Crooked Man
episodes.plot: Col. Barclay is found dead and his wife is arrested for the murder, but Holmes is convinced a missing door key will reveal the true killer.

episodes.title: The Speckled Band
episodes.plot: A young woman asks for Holmes' help when her ill-tempered stepfather moves her into the same room where her sister died under mysterious circumstances.

episodes.title: The Blue Carbuncle
episodes.plot: When the Countess of Morcar's priceless blue carbuncle is stolen, a reformed thief is charged with the crime.
